verses.plain: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.

tokens.t: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.

verses.plain: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.

tokens.t: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.

verses.plain: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.

tokens.t: the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.

verses.plain: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.

tokens.t: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant
yea, I have a goodly heritage.

verses.plain: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.

tokens.t: , who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.

verses.plain: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.

tokens.t: at my right hand, I shall not be moved.

verses.plain: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.

tokens.t: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.

verses.plain: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

tokens.t: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

verses.plain: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

tokens.t: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence
fulness of joy; at thy right hand

footnotes.text: hasten…: or, give gifts to another
of mine…: Heb. of my part
